Listing 19.6: Example of a function for creating overlapping windows of data.
When we run this function on the entire training dataset, we transform 159 samples into
1,099; speciﬁcally, the transformed dataset has the shapes X=[1099, 7, 1] and y=[1099, 7].
Next, we can deﬁne and ﬁt the CNN model on the training data. This multi-step time series
forecasting problem is an autoregression. That means it is likely best modeled where that the
